info.ephyra.search.searchers
Class YahooKM

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      info.ephyra.search.searchers.Searcher
          info.ephyra.search.searchers.KnowledgeMiner
              info.ephyra.search.searchers.YahooKM
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class YahooKM
extends KnowledgeMiner

A KnowledgeMiner that deploys the Yahoo search engine to search the Web.

It runs as a separate thread, so several queries can be performed in parallel.

This class extends the class KnowledgeMiner.

Version:
2007-05-29
Author:
Nico Schlaefer
